amendment.description: An amendment numbered 16 printed in Part B of House Report 115-711 to provide for $35 million from within funds appropriated to the Office of Nuclear Energy to meet the House-passed authorization level for the Versatile Neutron Source, a fast test reactor user facility.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Weber (TX) amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. Weber (TX).
